page.title: 04DUNDONALD NEWS, JUNE, 1985
page.content: { On Tuesday of this week plans were put forward to turn part of the now disused Monsanto Nylon factory into a home for elderly people. Local teenagers can now look forward to a new Youth Club organised for them in the Church Hall each week. Prestwick Air Show was held on Saturday and many local people went to see and enjoy the many attractions. Those who did not had a good view of the many strange aircraft as they flew to and from the Show. Finally, local people are looking forward to the Annual Fete when many events will take place, including the crowning of the Queen,judging of best-dressed pram and bicycle, five-a-side football and many more attractions.
